## Code Quality Checklist

- [ ] Code follows the project's coding standards (run `composer format`)
- [ ] Code passes static analysis (run `composer phpstan`)
- [ ] Code passes Rector checks (run `composer rector-dry`)
- [ ] All tests pass (run `composer test`)
- [ ] Documentation has been updated (README, CHANGELOG, inline docs)
- [ ] No breaking changes, or breaking changes are documented
- [ ] Commit messages follow [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/)
